root.name: Quattro Sports
root.description: Overview Baseball Pros: This is a typical baseball simulation. Every player has their own characteristic to where you can decide on whom you think the best pitcher and hitter. Soccer Simulator: This is a fast-paced soccer simulation game that covers every aspect of what you would do in a real soccer game. Pro Tennis: Play a nice game of tennis on gravel, grass, or clay courts. The game features all the aspects and shots from what you would do in a real tennis game. BMX Simulator: Race to beat the clock on all 15 action packed courses!
